related_questions.question: Contoh paragraf dalam kalimat-kalimat yang bentuk present perfect tense​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Today is 16th August and tomorrow is my sister’s birthday. Her name is Kristal. I want to give her a surprise. I have talked to some of her friends. They have helped me to prepare a surprising party. We have discussed it since July.

We are going to celebrate my sister’s birthday in a small restaurant near my house. Our parents have also agreed it. The restaurant has been booked by our parents.

What about the birthday present? No worries, I have prepared it too. She loves art very much. I have made a painting for her. I hope she will like it. But I haven’t wrapped the painting because it hasn’t dried yet.

Have you ever celebrated someone’s birthday?

related_questions.question:
This text is for question numbers 14-17    My Neighbour
Mr. And Mrs. Ruslan are my neighbors. They have two children,
a son and a daughter. Their names are Fahril and Mayada. Mr. Ruslan is a lecturer in
a state university in our town. Mrs. Ruslanis a house wife. She likes cooking many kinds
of food. She often invites me to cook together in her kitchen. Mr. Ruslan's family has some
pets. There are some birds, a cat and two rabits. I sometimes feed them. I like guing there
because they are kind and friendly. They always show good attitude to everyone.
14. Does Ruslan's family live far from the writer's house?
a. Yes, they do
c. Yes, it does
b. No, they do not
d. No, it doesn't
15. Where does Mr. Ruslan work? He works in a.....
a. University
c. kitchen
b. school
d. company
16. I sometimes feed them. The underlined word means.......
a. ask food to somebody or something
b.give food to somebody or something
C. eat food with somebody
d. take food froom somebody
17. " she ofteninvites me to cook together in her kitchen."The word "me" refers to.....
a, the teacher
c. Mayada
c. the writer
d. Mr. Ruslan​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

14. b

15. a

16. b

17. c

Penjelasan:

i'm not sure about number 14, i'm sorry

related_questions.question:
For questions number 18 to 20, Complete the following text with the suitable words.    Mr.Komar is an English teacher. He speak English fluently.
His wife, Mrs. Nani is a(18)......She helps sick people.
She doesn't speak English. Mr.Komar has two children.
They study English not only at school but also at home.
They are(19).....students. Their father teaches them every night,
So they can speak English (20) ......He is very proud of them.
18. a. teacher
b. janitor
c. doctor
d. chef
19. a. lazy
b. proud
c. stupid
d. diligent
20. a. fluently
b. silently
C. slowly
d. badly
This text is for questions number 21 to 23.
My favorite animal is rabbit. Rabit has two longears.
Its eyes are big and black, but when it is dark its eyes are red.
It has two long teeth Its nose is small and soft pink.
Its tail is soft,round and small like a cotton ball. Its legs are small,
It doesn't walk, it jumps It is vegetarian and its favorite food is carrct.
Rabbits are very cute.
21. How many ears does the rabbit have?
a. two ears
c. three ears
b. four ears
d. five ears​

answers.answer:
18. C. Doctor

Penjelasan :

Teks diatas menjelaskan pekerjaan Mrs. Nani yang membantu orang sakit. Jadi, jawabannya adalah (C.)

19. D. Diligent

Penjelasan :

Teks diatas mengatakan mereka selalu belajar Bahasa Inggris setiap malam dan mereka sangat rajin, Jadi jawabannya adalah (D.)

20. A. Fluently

Penjelasan :

Teks diatas mengatakan bahwa Mr. Komar sangat bangga dengan anak-anak nya karena bisa berbahasa Inggris dengan lancar. Jadi jawabannya adalah (A.)

21. How many ears does the rabbit have?

: A. Two ears

Penjelasan :

Berdasarkan teks diatas, kelinci adalah binatang favorit sang penulis dan kelinci itu mempunyai 2 telinga. Jadi jawabannya adalah (A.)

Maaf kalau ada yang salah dalam penyampaian kata²nya, apabila ada yang salah dalam jawabannya bisa dikoreksi yaa, semoga membantu ! <3

—Miranthi P.

D. Australian (at sentence number 4 pargraph 1)

B. Tania (sentence number 3 paragraph 3)

C. Tall and handsome (sentence number 5 paragraph 2)

D. Five, they are Mom, Dad, Amanda, Bryan, and Tania.

Simple by hucas
